title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Researchers ‘decode’ Mandarin Chinese from neural signals
items.description: Advances in brain-computer interfaces could help millions who use tonal languages speak again after stroke or disease

items.title: Simple mix of enzymes shows how information arises out of chemical chaos
items.description: Roots of computational intelligence may lie deeper in matter than scientists thought

items.title: Canada’s new budget aims to lure U.S. researchers to relocate
items.description: Spending plan also calls for smaller research spending cut than feared

items.title: Mystery group lived in central Argentina for millennia, ancient DNA reveals
items.description: New study fills major gap in genetic map of ancient human migrations

items.title: Have physicists finally solved the ‘golfer’s curse’?
items.description: Team says it has hit on an explanation for heartbreaking “lip outs”

items.title: Main U.S. funder of physical sciences chops down advisory panels, alarms researchers
items.description: Scientists fear merger of Department of Energy advisory committees that gave them their voices at agency

items.title: Forests are migrating up mountain peaks
items.description: Satellite imagery reveals an unexpected shift in tree lines—but it may not have anything to do with climate change

items.title: U.K. science sector is ‘bleeding to death,’ lawmakers say in report
items.description: House of Lords committee urges government to stem exodus of science and technology companies

items.title: Australia’s red rocks hold mysteriously detailed fossils. We finally know how they formed
items.description: Chemical analysis could help predict locations of other ancient sites with impeccable fossils

items.title: Startup pioneers subscription service for space-based astronomy
items.description: Blue Skies Space will sell data from its tiny, low-cost UV telescope
